definition: to connect/to relate to/to tie up/to bind/to be (literary)
cubical system (crystallography)/crystal system based on cubic lattice/equiaxial crystal system

sentences.english: The X ray diffraction exhibited that this type of the compounds was monoclinic system.
sentences.chinese: 射线衍射分析表示该类化合物均属斜方晶系。

sentences.english: Microstructure of Ti-Si eutectic alloys is observed.
sentences.chinese: 观察了钛硅共晶系合金的微观组织。

sentences.english: The point groups of octagonal system in quasicrystal are studied.
sentences.chinese: 从理论上对准晶体中八方晶系各点群进行了研究。

sentences.english: The main depositional conditions which favour the formation of the cubic phase diamonds are also discussed.
sentences.chinese: 论述了有利于形成立方晶系金刚石材料的沉积条件。

sentences.english: This method can be applied to all crystal systems, except for the triclinic.
sentences.chinese: 此方法可适用于除三斜晶系外的全部晶系。

sentences.english: This method can be applied to all crystal systems, except for the triclinic.
sentences.chinese: 此方法可适用于除三斜晶系外的全部晶系。

sentences.english: This Paper Researched Calculation Method of Regular Triangular Pyramia.
sentences.chinese: 本文探讨了正三角锥晶系的计算方法。

sentences.english: The results show other four phosphates belong to orthorhombic monoclinic system except ammonium copper phosphate has rhombic system.
sentences.chinese: 结果表明，除铜盐为斜方晶系外，其余都为正交晶系。

sentences.english: The results show other four phosphates belong to orthorhombic monoclinic system except ammonium copper phosphate has rhombic system.
sentences.chinese: 结果表明，除铜盐为斜方晶系外，其余都为正交晶系。

sentences.english: By the means of Ito analysised crystal parameter were obtained.
sentences.chinese: 利用Ito法分析了其晶型晶系及晶胞参数。

sentences.english: This method is simple and easy in calculation and it is applicable to all crystal systems.
sentences.chinese: 该方法简便易算而且适用子各个晶系。

sentences.english: Gray and turquoise single monoclinic system crystalline powder or granule.
sentences.chinese: 暗淡蓝绿单斜晶系晶体性粉末或颗粒。

definition: cubical system (crystallography)/crystal system based on cubic lattice/equiaxial crystal system
alkaline earth (i.e. beryllium Be 鈹|铍, magnesium Mg 鎂|镁, calcium Ca 鈣|钙, strontium Sr 鍶|锶, barium Ba 鋇|钡 and radium Ra 鐳|镭)
crystal lattice (the regular 3-dimensional pattern formed by atoms in a crystal)
orthoclase KAlSi3O8 (rock-forming mineral, type of feldspar)
